title: Promises to Keep
description: Death is a part of life. But Lydi never imagined it would follow her family across the plains from Chicago to the rolling hills of Iowa. Discover the hope and grit of a pre-war family as they cope with the loss of more than a father.This book feels like a pre-war biography written through the eyes and ears of a ten-year-old farm girl. Feel the soft, green grass between your feet. Smell the fresh-cut hay warming in the sun. Experience the life of an immigrant family around their farm, at school, and with their neighbors. Discover the delight—and heartbreak—of a family struggling to build a new home.Learn what it meant to work heard, to trust, and—in the end—to persevere. “No matter how difficult things may be, we will not give up.” In a world of suffering and cynicism, Promises to Keep is a fresh draught of water to refresh your soul.
author: DeAnn Kruempel
